snippet: Mack Brown said that Texas would have allowed him to continue coaching but that he decided to resign because his teams have not been meeting the winning standard he helped create.
abstract: Texas football coach Mack Brown says university would have allowed him to stay but he has decided to resign because his teams have not been meeting the winning standard he helped create; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Mack Brown said that Texas would have allowed him to continue coaching but that he decided to resign because his teams have not been meeting the winning standard he helped create.
